item.title: On choosing independence… for a software developer
item.description: É tempo! Independência ou Morte! Estamos separados de Portugal! Rant in the woods On 2020 I’ve been watching lots of Luke Smith’s videos, among other Linux-related youtubers. Luke’s known to be a controversial figure, and he often wanders off the regular bash-and-vim routine to talk about something else, like this one, where talks about independence and life choices. As in, how he feels life gets better when, on a decision-by-decision basis, we strive for more independence.
